titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 953) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1988 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Transportation and the Federal Maritime Commission.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-112.

bill.summary: 5/28/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 953 (maritime programs funding).
